<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?>
<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="920.0" prefWidth="1200.0" style="-fx-background-color: linear-gradient(to bottom, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.smartmedicalinventory.controller.Admin_dashbordcontroller"> <children> <!-- Sidebar Navigation --> <VBox layoutX="0.0" layoutY="0.0" prefHeight="920.0" prefWidth="250.0" spacing="10.0" style="-fx-background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95); -fx-background-radius: 0 15 15 0; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 10, 0, 2, 0);"> <children> <!-- Dashboard Header --> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="100.0" style="-fx-background-color: #FF9800; -fx-background-radius: 0 15 0 0;"> <children> <Label text="Smart Medical" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Admin Dashboard" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="12.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox>
<!-- Navigation Buttons --> <VBox spacing="5.0"> <children> <Button onAction="#manageUsers" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="241.0" style="-fx-background-color: #4CAF50; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 14px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text=" Manage Users"> <VBox.margin> <Insets left="10.0" right="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Button> <Button onAction="#addUser" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #388E3C; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 13px;" text="➕ Add User" /> <Button onAction="#removeUser" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #D32F2F; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 13px;" text="️ Remove User" /> <Button onAction="#updateUser" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #1976D2; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 13px;" text="✏️ Update User" /> <Button onAction="#viewAllUsers" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #7B1FA2; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 13px;" text=" View All Users" /> <Button onAction="#viewBuyHistory" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #FFA000; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 13px;" text=" View Buy History" /> <Button contentDisplay="CENTER" onAction="#settings" prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="218.0" style="-fx-background-color: #455A64; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 13px;" text="⚙️ Settings" /> <Button onAction="#viewSalesReport" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2196F3; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 14px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text=" Sales Report"> <VBox.margin> <Insets left="10.0" right="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Button> <Button onAction="#medicineOversight" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #9C27B0; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 14px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text=" Medicine Oversight"> <VBox.margin> <Insets left="10.0" right="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Button> <Button onAction="#systemLogs" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #FF5722; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 14px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text=" System Logs"> <VBox.margin> <Insets left="10.0" right="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Button> </children> <padding> <Insets top="20.0" /> </padding> </VBox>
<!-- Spacer --> <Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<!-- Logout Button --> <Button onAction="#logout" prefWidth="230.0" style="-fx-background-color: #F44336; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 8; -fx-font-size: 14px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text=" Logout"> <VBox.margin> <Insets bottom="20.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Button> </children> </VBox>
<!-- Main Content Area --> <VBox layoutX="250.0" layoutY="0.0" prefHeight="920.0" prefWidth="950.0" spacing="20.0"> <children> <!-- Header Bar --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="80.0" spacing="20.0" style="-fx-background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); -fx-background-radius: 15; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 5, 0, 0, 2);"> <children> <Label text="Admin Management System" textFill="#333"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="24.0" /> </font> </Label> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" /> <TextField fx:id="quickSearchField" promptText="Quick Search..." style="-fx-background-radius: 20; -fx-padding: 8;" /> <Button onAction="#quickSearch" style="-fx-background-color: #FF9800; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 20;" text="Search" /> </children> <padding> <Insets left="20.0" right="20.0" /> </padding> </HBox>
<!-- Dashboard Cards --> <HBox spacing="20.0"> <children> <!-- Total Users Card --> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="150.0" prefWidth="200.0" style="-fx-background-color: rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.9); -fx-background-radius: 15; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 8, 0, 0, 4);"> <children> <Label text="" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="36.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label fx:id="totalUsersLabel" text="1,234" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="28.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Total Users" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox>
<!-- Sales Card --> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="150.0" prefWidth="200.0" style="-fx-background-color: rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.9); -fx-background-radius: 15; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 8, 0, 0, 4);"> <children> <Label text="" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="36.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label fx:id="salesLabel" text="₹ 45,000" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="28.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Total Sales" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox>
<!-- Medicines Card --> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="150.0" prefWidth="200.0" style="-fx-background-color: rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.9); -fx-background-radius: 15; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 8, 0, 0, 4);"> <children> <Label text="" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="36.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label fx:id="totalMedicinesLabel" text="2,456" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="28.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Total Medicines" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox>
<!-- Logs Card --> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="150.0" prefWidth="200.0" style="-fx-background-color: rgba(156, 39, 176, 0.9); -fx-background-radius: 15; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 8, 0, 0, 4);"> <children> <Label text="" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="36.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label fx:id="logsLabel" text="1,200" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="28.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="System Logs" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </children> </HBox>
<!-- Main Content ScrollPane --> <ScrollPane fx:id="mainContentPane" fitToWidth="true" prefHeight="500.0" style="-fx-background: transparent; -fx-background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); -fx-background-radius: 15;"> <content> <VBox fx:id="contentArea" alignment="TOP_CENTER" spacing="20.0" style="-fx-background-color: transparent;"> <children> <Label text="Welcome to Admin Management System" textFill="#333"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="20.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Manage users, view sales reports, oversee medicines, and review system logs." textFill="#666"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </Label> <!-- Admin Actions Section --> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="10.0" /> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="20.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </content> </ScrollPane> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="20.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

-fx-background-radius: 20; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-font-weight: bold; -fx-effect: dropshadow(gaussian, rgba(0,0,0,0.3), 5, 0, 0, 2);" text="Register"> <font> <Font size="17.0" /> </font> </Button> </HBox> </children> </VBox> <Button fx:id="backIcon" layoutX="30.0" layoutY="30.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#backmethod" prefHeight="40.0" prefWidth="40.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 20;
